Package lib.homies.framework.party

Class DefaultPartyService

java.lang.Object
lib.homies.framework.party.DefaultPartyService
All Implemented Interfaces:
PartyService
public class DefaultPartyService extends Object implements PartyService
Default, platform-independent implementation of the PartyService interface. This service manages the lifecycle of parties, including creation, disbanding, invitations, and member interactions. It leverages other framework services like MessageUtils for player feedback.

      public DefaultPartyService()

  • Method Details

    • createParty

      public Party createParty(HomiesPlayer leader)
      Creates a new party with the given player as its leader. If the leader is already in a party, an error message is sent.
      Specified by:
      createParty in interface PartyService
      Parameters:
      leader - The HomiesPlayer who will be the leader of the new party.
      Returns:
      The newly created Party instance, or null if the leader is already in a party.

    • disbandParty

      public void disbandParty(Party party)
      Disbands an existing party. All members will be removed from the party, and any pending invitations for its members will be cleared.
      Specified by:
      disbandParty in interface PartyService
      Parameters:
      party - The Party instance to disband.

    • getParty

      public Optional<Party> getParty(UUID partyId)
      Gets a party by its unique ID.
      Specified by:
      getParty in interface PartyService
      Parameters:
      partyId - The UUID of the party.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the Party if found, otherwise Optional.empty().

    • getPartyByPlayer

      public Optional<Party> getPartyByPlayer(HomiesPlayer player)
      Gets the party a player is currently a member of.
      Specified by:
      getPartyByPlayer in interface PartyService
      Parameters:
      player - The HomiesPlayer to check.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the Party if the player is in one, otherwise Optional.empty().

    • getAllParties

      public Set<Party> getAllParties()
      Gets an unmodifiable set of all currently active parties.
      Specified by:
      getAllParties in interface PartyService
      Returns:
      A Set of all active Party instances.

    • invitePlayer

      public void invitePlayer(HomiesPlayer inviter, HomiesPlayer invited)
      Invites a player to a party. The inviter must be the leader of a party to send an invitation. Various checks are performed (inviter in party, inviter is leader, invited not in party, no pending invitation).
      Specified by:
      invitePlayer in interface PartyService
      Parameters:
      inviter - The HomiesPlayer sending the invitation (must be a party leader).
      invited - The HomiesPlayer to invite to the party.

    • acceptInvitation

      public void acceptInvitation(HomiesPlayer player, HomiesPlayer inviter)
      Accepts a party invitation. The player will join the party of the inviter if a valid invitation exists.
      Specified by:
      acceptInvitation in interface PartyService
      Parameters:
      player - The HomiesPlayer accepting the invitation.
      inviter - The HomiesPlayer who sent the invitation.

    • declineInvitation

      public void declineInvitation(HomiesPlayer player, HomiesPlayer inviter)
      Declines a party invitation.
      Specified by:
      declineInvitation in interface PartyService
      Parameters:
      player - The HomiesPlayer declining the invitation.
      inviter - The HomiesPlayer who sent the invitation.

    • kickMember

      public void kickMember(HomiesPlayer leader, HomiesPlayer member)
      Kicks a member from a party. The leader must be the leader of the party to perform a kick.
      Specified by:
      kickMember in interface PartyService
      Parameters:
      leader - The HomiesPlayer who is the party leader performing the kick.
      member - The HomiesPlayer to kick from the party.

    • leaveParty

      public void leaveParty(HomiesPlayer player)
      Allows a player to leave their current party. If the player is the leader and other members exist, leadership will be transferred. If the party becomes empty, it will be disbanded.
      Specified by:
      leaveParty in interface PartyService
      Parameters:
      player - The HomiesPlayer leaving the party.

    • transferLeadership

      public void transferLeadership(HomiesPlayer currentLeader, HomiesPlayer newLeader)
      Transfers leadership of a party from the current leader to another member. The currentLeader must be the actual leader, and newLeader must be a member of the party.
      Specified by:
      transferLeadership in interface PartyService
      Parameters:
      currentLeader - The HomiesPlayer who is the current leader.
      newLeader - The HomiesPlayer to transfer leadership to (must be a current member).
